dogslow_client

Replication client. Methods are identical to one of DogslowServer. For detailed explanation look at that class.

Comment:
DogslowClient is descendant of DnetClient. For how to connect to server look at DnetClient.

const int CLIENT;


const int ADDRESS;


class DogslowClient: dnet_client.DnetClient;


bool connect(char[] address, ushort port);


int getClientId();


int addObject(int class_id);


int[] getObjects(int class_id);


void deleteObject(int class_id, int object_id);


void setString(int class_id, int object_id, int property_id, char[] value, bool replicate);


void setByte(int class_id, int object_id, int property_id, char value, bool replicate);


void setShort(int class_id, int object_id, int property_id, short value, bool replicate);


void setInt(int class_id, int object_id, int property_id, int value, bool replicate);


void setFloat(int class_id, int object_id, int property_id, float value, bool replicate);


void setVector3f(int class_id, int object_id, int property_id, float[3] value, bool replicate);


void setPointer(int class_id, int object_id, int property_id, void* value);


char[] getString(int class_id, int object_id, int property_id);


char getByte(int class_id, int object_id, int property_id);


short getShort(int class_id, int object_id, int property_id);


int getInt(int class_id, int object_id, int property_id);


float getFloat(int class_id, int object_id, int property_id);


float[] getVector3f(int class_id, int object_id, int property_id);


void* getPointer(int class_id, int object_id, int property_id);
